channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole, 4th April
item.description:
Pothole on Noverton Lane, on the left just after passed turning into a Roberts Road, going towards Prestbury village. Looks like breakdown of previous repair possibly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Noverton Lane, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 4th April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway depression 1000x1100x30mm tarmac patch required stats required (FW6 Rutting&Depressions)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 4th April
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE NEEDED BEST OUT OF HOURS PLEASE LIFT AN RELAY X1 ROCKING 450X450X20MM SLAB (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 4th April
item.description:
Customer has been advised that STW won't install a water meter in the bank outside the location as Highways won't give permission for them to close the lane/install temporary traffic controls to do so. They query if an application has been made by STW for the installation and indeed refused?
Report on FixMyStreet
